Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちはハーフの事を、 どう思う？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you think about Halfs?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……最初は驚いたが……オレたちと何が違う というものでもないだろう……？
Entry.EnglishText: I was surprised at first, but... Are they really any different from us?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ、そうだ……だが…… そう思えない人も多い……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, you're right... However, there are many who would disagree with that notion...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでだよ！ 何がいけないって言うんだよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: But why?! What's wrong with being a Half?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ん、なんだよ、嬉しそうな顔して？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Huh? What's got you looking so happy?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いや、おまえたちのような若者がいれば、 きっといつかはな……
Entry.EnglishText: ..Well, with youths like you around, I'm sure someday people will come to understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……疑問や怒りを感じた、おまえたちの 気持ちを大切にするんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: You need to cherish your feelings of doubt and frustration towards this injustice...
Entry.Notes: I had to make an assumption but i'm pretty sure it's about the people who disagree with Halfs not being the same
